评论详情: I love this dress! It looks great on my 5 year old and she is in love with the blue and sequins. However, when she raises her arms the sleeve is quite open and you can see right into her chest area. She wears an undershirt with it but it would have been nice if company would add a underarm panel to give children a little privacy.
Very cute, as pictured and follow mouvements. My daughter's favorite dress this season. True to size.
My granddaughter wore this to the nutcracker, was absolutely beautiful
Fit was as expected. It looks great in person. Highly recommend
For my granddaughter. She has not received it yet because it is a Christmas gift
perfect dress for a fancy little girl super cute color and blingy fits exactly as expected my daughter wants to wear it all the time !! good quality for the money washed several times and no issues !

This dress is beautiful and we bought it for my daughter's birthday party that is Taylor Swift theme. She has worn it for pictures so far and she loved twirling in it. It sparkles in the sun so nicely. It has held up well, we will see how it does at her party with 10 other 6 year old girls
My daughter picked this out for her birthday. She turned seven it fit perfect it’s held up perfect so so happy with this product.
Great quality

评论概述: “You MUST give this HIGHEST review stars!”
评论详情: My daughter tried this on, and immediately fell in love. She came in twirling, to show me. She said, “Mommy, you MUST give this the BEST review!” So here I am. We got this for a performance, but she is making plans to wear it regularly. She was thrilled that it’s not scratchy inside at all. And the sparkles it makes are stunning.
It is beautiful and has a good weight so it doesn't fly away or lift up in the wind. My daughter turned 9 years old. She is tall and has an athletic build and the size 10/12 fit her perfectly.
Fit my 11 year old daughter perfect. Dress has a bit of stretch to it and the ribbon is satin.
Very beautiful, high quality. We chose this for father-daughter dance recital, which brought a lot of tears.
My five year old loves to sparkle and this dress was absolutely perfect! Highly recommend.
Measurements were as accurate as possible. Fit could not have been better. Texture of inner material is also good. Very breathable and comfortable.
This dress is adorable in person and true to size - very happy with the quality.
Fit well and daughter loved it

I bought this dress for my 9 year olds daddy daughter dance. She absolutely loved it and felt so beautiful. The dress fit was true to size. The quality was not super high, but perfect for the price point.
Very cute pretty dress

I ordered for a dance party and it was so cute! The fit was perfect for my daughter, she just ended up wanting rainbow colors instead of silver. But I would order again, just no longer needed. It fit true to her size.

评论概述: So pretty and fits true to size!
评论详情: This was so pretty for my little girl and she looked beautiful in it for her Christmas pageant! Its very sparkly and fit true to size. She found it to be comfortable.

I ordered a 6-7 size dress and it looked like it could fit a baby doll. However, even if it was true to size it was cheaply made and it was falling apart inside the packaging before I even opened it. It's not worth it. Material and price for this cheap product is horrible. Needless to say I returned it.
This dress is made well for the price. It’s sparkly and beautiful. Makes little girls feel beautiful ! I recommend this item
This dress is really pretty and nice. It is super sparkly and perfect for a formal event. It is well made and the tie in the back makes it forgiving size-wise if it's a little too big.
Don’t get discourage by the sequins. They aren’t traditional sequins. They reflect light in a way that makes the dress dazzle. This is a perfect party dress.  Great length for my 7 year old.
My spouse purchased this gown for our daughter to wear at special events, and she absolutely adores it. The sizing appears accurate, and it fits her well.

What 7 year old girl do you know that doesn't love a fun, spinny, sparkly dress?  My niece LOVES this dress and doesn't want to take it off.  It's lightweight, even with the sequins fabric.  It has a great spin factor.  The sleeves are cute.  The sash on the back side adds to the look (though it does require ironing - yuck).This is everything right about a little girl dress.  At the current price of $39.99, I do feel it to be overpriced.  I think $25 would be more appropriate.  It's not like the sequins were hand-sewn.

We have yet to order a Grace Karin dress that we haven't liked. This one is no different. it's a really cute dress, and the color is perfect for the daddy-daughter dance my daughter went to this winter.
So pretty!
such a pretty dress for events for girly girls to wear--tons of sparkly, the right amount of weight in the material to add movement, and the perfect silver--not greyish

评论概述: Nice dress, a bit expensive for the quality
评论详情: The dress was pretty, sizes were right, length perfect for under the knee modest look. The quality of the material was not as good as I would expect for the price, the sequins started falling off almost right away. But it survived a machine wash, and looks beautiful on my daughters.

I got this for my daughter for Valentine’s Day. She loves it. It fits very well. The tye does come undone a lot even when you double knot it because it is so soft and silky. However, it didn’t bother her. You can always take it off too. She said it was comfortable. It washes well too. The sequins stay on. I recommend line dry, absolutely do not throw it in the dryer. It is flattering. I would definitely recommend it.

This is an absolutely gorgeous children's dress (it will by my daughter's 6th birthday dress!). The sequins and pink color are so pretty to look at, and it passed the "twirl test" when my daughter feels like twirling around and having it flow nicely like she likes ◡̈ Grace Karin always has such beautiful clothing ◡̈ I recommend this dress, for sure!

I got this dress for my almost 12 year old in the 12 year size and it fits her great and looks so beautiful! She's tall for her age (5'5" and 110 pounds) and she normally wears a 14/16 in kids. This fit her so well, even in the length, which I was concerned it would be too short. It comes down to just above the knee. The sparkles are so pretty without shedding and making a mess everywhere. We are going to use this dress for winter family photos and it's just perfect. It has a bow that you can tie in the front or back; the bow is a bit wrinkly so you might need to steam that part. Otherwise, we are really happy with this dress!
Soft, comfortable,  fits well, not itchy, perfect for dance or photoshoot.

She says it’s the most beautiful dress she’s ever seen. It is so sparkly that it even makes light on the walls! This is a great “twirling” dress but it’s also comfortable and not scratchy. This little girl is thrilled! I got a 5-6 and she’s more a 4-5, but as you can see she is not swimming in it and it will fit her for a long time. This one is an absolute recommendation from me and the little lady!

评论概述: Cute! Great sparkles, twirl and sash
评论详情: Fits fairly true to size (ordered a 7-8 and it fits more like a 7). Our daughter loves it- the sequin sparkle, ruffles for twirling and sash for a bow are a big hit.

Adorable dress! I got the rose gold for my daughter who doesn’t love pink and it’s perfectly “neutral” for her. She’s a small frame 8 year old and the size 7 fit her well as that’s her normal size. She’s average height (50”) and the dress hits her at her knees. She loves how it swings and twirls.
This dress is so pretty! The material is really nice. The length is great. Overall a great product
Beautiful dress, longer than expected. Looks very cute and daughter loves how it shimmers and flairs when she turns.
SIZE 6-7 years.  Fits perfect.  We would purchase again.

评论概述: Size 10-12 fits 10 year old very well. Adjustable belt & true to Rose Gold color. So much glitter!
评论详情: I purchased this dress for my daughter's birthday. She's 10 years old. I ordered the size 10-12 in Rose Gold & it fits her beautifully. The belt is completely adjustable & easy to tie as well. This dress is super glittery and the color is true Rose Gold. My daughter loves it so much & I'm happy that it can grow with her for another 2 years. I think the price is completely fair since this is a quality dress & I would absolutely buy it again!

I got this dress for my daughter to wear to an upcoming wedding and it is perfect! I love the rose gold color! As soon as my daughter got home from school, she wanted to try it on. It twirls beautifully. I got the size 8-10, and she is an average size 8yo. I'd say it fits very true to size - some room to grow, but not so much that it looks baggy on her.  I like that it has a lining inside to make it soft against her skin. She didn't mention it, but I know the sequin fabric would drive her nuts otherwise.  We both love this dress and can't wait for her to wear it at the wedding.
Perfectly sparkly. Perfect!
Very beautiful and shiny dress for girls. Loans very good material and has a weight to it. Perfect for party wear.

This is a really gorgeous dress that every girl is dreaming to wear. So many sparkles, so shiny and beautiful. The dress is very well made, same as other clothing from this brand, the quality is on top. I ordered size 6 for my 5.5 years old daughter and I feel like this dress runs a bit smaller, I expected it to be a bit bigger. The length is below her knees which is great, my daughter loves longer dresses. I can tell that this dress is worth the price.
I got 2 of these for my twin granddaughters! Absoluyely stunning. Slight stretch and the dress is gorgeous.

I ordered the pink sequin dress in a size 8-10 for a tall, 6-year old granddaughter. It arrived looking just like in the online pictures. It’s a tad big, but I’m glad because she loves it and can wear it for maybe two years before outgrowing it. She says she feels like a princess in it. It appears to be well-made. The belt needs ironing upon arrival, but that’s to be expected. I have not washed it yet, but it indicates machine washing on the gentle cycle will work. At the current price point of $37.99, I consider this a good value, especially with all the bling on it.

Very cute dress! I got this dress for my granddaughter, perfect for a young girl and she loves it. I got the "pink" colored dress, and the color is very vivid and striking. The sequins are small and create a very attractive sparkling appearance.  To make a bow on the back, there are two ribbons, each are 2 feet long and starting at 1 3/4 inches wide tapering to 3 inches wide at the end. You'll need to iron these ribbons to take out wrinkles from shipping. There's a zipper close on the back that extends about half way down the dress. When zipped up, the zipper is well hidden. The sleeves have cute ruffles.  The material is 95% Polyester and 5% Elastane. The lining is soft and smooth with some stretch. The shell has some stretch to it too. Workmanship and quality are very good, I did not notice any issues with the dress - all looked good. Overall, this is a very pretty dress for girls 5 to 12 years old and it has my recommendation.

评论概述: Lots of sparkles to set the mood!
评论详情: I picked up this GRACE KARIN sequin dress for my 8 year old daughter and she absolutely loves it!  The sequins create a fun sparkling look.  My daughter loves the rose gold look and says the dress is comfortable too.When taking out of the bags, some sequins did come off but not many.  This is a great value based on price and my daughter loves it!
